recipe.title: Summer Twang
instructions: Purée 2 cups chopped cantaloupe, 3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, and 3 tablespoons honey in a blender. Strain into a measuring cup or bowl, pressing on solids; discard solids. Divide among 4 Collins glasses filled with ice and add 2-3 ounces club soda to each. Garnish with cantaloupe wedges.
